title: OpenProject 12.0.10
content:
OpenProject 12.0.10 was released on March 16, 2022, and includes several bug fixes and changes, with a recommendation to update to the newest version. The primary reason for this release was to fix localization issues where some translations provided by the Crowdin integration were temporarily reverted to their English originals.

Specific bug fixes and changes in this release include:
Fixed: Several Translation Errors [DE] [#41414]
Fixed: LOCALE env used for seeding is too generic [#41427]
Fixed: Broken translation in Russian/German language after upgrade to actual release [#41434]

The release notes also acknowledge contributions from community members, specifically thanking Jörg Mollowitz and Атилла Алтымышев for reporting and finding bugs.
